title: Load-balance Docker Webapps in 1min and 30s with Caddy

media:group.media:title: Load-balance Docker Webapps in 1min and 30s with Caddy
media:group.media:description:
This setup obviously is not perfect and I would not recommend using it like that in production, but from that point you have all the possibilities!

Caddy Docker Image:
https://github.com/abiosoft/caddy-docker
https://hub.docker.com/r/abiosoft/caddy/

More about Caddy, the  HTTP/2 web server with automatic HTTPS:
https://caddyserver.com/

The Docker Logo belongs to https://docker.com
